name: NWORX
description: NWORX is India’s pioneering ‘Performance Enablement’ platform, catering to a growing global market for ‘performance-driven business growth.’ Powered by intelligent, next-gen AI technology, the B2B SaaS platform equips organizations to transition from a traditional performance management approach to a goal-driven ‘performance enablement’ approach resulting in better business outcomes. Launched by Hariraj Vijayakumar and Shwetal Shubhadeep in October 2020, NWORX is unique within the larger HR Tech segment – it brings together deep expertise in the talent domain and advanced AI technology. NWORX has enormous promise for India (its founding country) - which will have 25% of the global workforce by 2050. It carries a significant promise of a larger impact as it strives to onboard a million professionals across the globe.
features: Inability to adapt and act on the shifting customer mindset.
The middle management layer is bloated, with no place to go.
Teams are unable to improve productivity even with improved domain expertise.
Headline: NWORX is a B2B SaaS platform used by enterprises to improve the performance of their leaders and teams.

enhanced_description: NWORX is India’s pioneering ‘Performance Enablement’ platform, a B2B SaaS solution leveraging intelligent, next-gen AI technology. Launched in October 2020 by Hariraj Vijayakumar and Shwetal Shubhadeep, it uniquely combines deep talent domain expertise with advanced AI. The platform equips organizations to transition from a traditional performance management approach to a goal-driven 'performance enablement' approach, aiming for 'performance-driven business growth' and better business outcomes. NWORX is designed to improve the performance of leaders and teams, contributing to enhanced employee happiness and engagement. It caters to a growing global market, with a significant promise for India's future workforce, striving to onboard a million professionals across the globe.
